post:
[QuickPacket](https://www.quickpacket.com) is pleased to offer our popular Xeon E3 servers out of Los Angeles, CA for our 2019 Cyber Monday Specials.

**Intel Xeon E3-1230v3**

- Quad Core 3.3GHz / 8MB Cache / HyperThreading (8 Threads!)
- 16GB DDR3 RAM, upgrade to 32GB DDR3 RAM available
- Drive options: **two 250GB SSDs**
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
- 20TB Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port 
- Unmanaged
- Located in Los Angeles, CA

**$49.99 per month - [CLICK HERE](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=278) to order!**

**Intel Xeon E3-1270 - 1Gbps Unmetered Bandwidth**

- Quad Core 3.4GHz / 8MB Cache / HyperThreading (8 Threads!)
- 16GB DDR3 RAM, upgrade to 32GB DDR3 RAM available
- Drive options: **two 1TB Hard Drives** [or] **one 120GB SSD and 1TB Hard Drive** [or] **two 120GB SSDs**
- 5 IP Addresses on Private VLAN with Reverse DNS
- /64 IPv6 Addresses upon request (More available with justification)
- Dedicated KVM over IP / IPMI
- Unmetered Bandwidth / 1 Gbps Port
- Unmanaged
- Located in Los Angeles, CA

**$99.99 per month - [CLICK HERE](https://www.quickpacket.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=279) to order!**


QuickPacket also offers a number of software licenses as add-ons:

- cPanel - Cloud starts at $12.50/month - Metal starts at $32/month
- KernelCare - $2/month
- CloudLinux - $9/month with cPanel, $11/month without
- Softaculous - VPS $1/month - Server $2/month
- WHMCS - Branded $12.80/month - Unbranded $14.80/month
- DirectAdmin - VPS $5/month - Server $9/month

Further details about QuickPacket and the promo offer:

- QuickPacket was founded in 2003 and is a registered LLC in North Carolina.
- Los Angeles network providers include PCCW, GTT and Cogent ([AS46261](http://bgp.he.net/AS46261)).
- Looking Glass/Test File: [Los Angeles](http://lg.lax.quickpacket.com)
- Los Angeles servers are located in 530 W 6th St (Adjacent to One Wilshire).
- Warez-related, Bulk Mail, and Spam-related activities are strictly forbidden. Please review our [Terms of Service](https://www.quickpacket.com/termsofservice.php) prior to ordering.
- We accept PayPal, VISA, Mastercard, American Express, Discover, Alipay, WeChat Pay and Bitcoin (through BitPay) payments.
- Promotional pricing is available for new customers or existing customers adding additional servers. Promotional offers cannot be combined with other promotional offers. Promotional pricing cannot be used on existing servers or to replace existing servers.
- Please contact our sales department with any questions prior to ordering. 

Thanks for your interest!
